snippet.title: Tactical Squad: SWAT Stories Devlog – Episode 2
snippet.description:
Time for episode 2 of the Tactical Squad: SWAT Stories Devlog, a tactical team game for PC Steam developed in collaboration between Ritual Interactive and Red Mountain Games.
Add the game to your wishlist on Steam and follow it to support our project!
→ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1619310/Tactical_Squad__SWAT_Stories/ ←

We also have an official Tactical Squad Discord server! Join to take part in the exclusive Community Playtest:
→ https://discord.gg/DQepwC6CcN ←
Come visit us and share your thoughts on the game!

Stay tuned for more development updates and news about the game's demo released later this year. Follow us on our media for future updates:
Red Mountain Games Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RedMountainGame/
Red Mountain Games Twitter: https://twitter.com/redmountaingame
Ritual Interactive Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Ritual.Int/
Ritual Interactive Twitter: https://twitter.com/Ritual_Int

Timestamps:
01 – Intro – 00:00
02 – Main menu – 00:06
03 – Briefing/Equipment – 00:35
04 – Gameplay 1 – 01:43
05 – Accessories – 03:23
06 – Gameplay 2 – 04:00
06 – Outro – 05:21

Music used in the video created by Avery Alexander: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ysPdUUUrpfQ&list=PL4bzLRtMcOvvXshAbcH-g4LJRn3ysixWE

#tacticalsquad #fps #indiegames #shooter #tactical #devlog #gamedev #ritualinteractive #redmountaingames
